participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: ambitious and creative, with a touch of whimsicality.
participant_1.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i have two grown children who never visit.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: adventurous and resourceful, with a passion for the outdoors.
participant_2.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.
